metadata.Title: CVE-2023-30087 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description: Buffer Overflow vulnerability found in Cesanta MJS v.1.26 allows a local attacker to cause a denial of service via the mjs_mk_string function in mjs.c.

notes.Note: ccdm94> openvlbi seems to contain a partial copy of the cesanta/mjs code and it includes the mentioned vulnerable function (mjs_mk_string).

criterions.comment: openvlbi package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
